original_text: After Paul did this, the other sick people on the island came to him. He caused them also to become well again.
korean_text: 이러므로 섬 가운데 다른 병든 사람들이 와서 고침을 받고

sentences.original_text: the other sick people on the island came to him
sentences.korean_translation: 섬에 있던 다른 병자들이 그에게 왔다

sentences.original_text: He caused them also to become well again
